original_text:
He was assigned a grave with the wicked,
    and with the rich in his death,
though he had done no violence,
    nor was any deceit in his mouth.
korean_text: 그는 강포를 행하지 아니하였고 그의 입에 거짓이 없었으나 그의 무덤이 악인들과 함께 있었으며 그가 죽은 후에 부자와 함께 있었도다

sentences.original_text: He was assigned a grave with the wicked
and with the rich in his death
though he had done no violence
nor was any deceit in his mouth
